text: John Ries Bartels Jr. (born November 27, 1934) is an American lawyer and politician. He was the first Administrator of the Drug Enforcement Administration from 1973 to 1975. He was also the first Chief of the New Jersey Organized Crime Strike Force. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:Drug Enforcement Administration Administrators Category:Living people Category:Lawyers from New York City Category:Politicians from New York City Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: John R. Bartels Jr.
